FuncDef: The reset remote-backup-service statistic command clears statistics about a specified RBS.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an RBS.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before viewing statistics about a specified RBS within a period, run the reset remote-backup-service statistic command to clear historical statistics about the RBS.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the display remote-backup-service command to view statistics about the RBS.
